thread.title: Techypassion Announces Site Makeover Offering a Broader Appeal to Visitors
thread.title_full: Techypassion Announces Site Makeover Offering a Broader Appeal to Visitors

title: Techypassion Announces Site Makeover Offering a Broader Appeal to Visitors
text:
Techypassion Announces Site Makeover Offering a Broader Appeal to Visitors 
Finding a free website packed with cutting edge technology advice, tips and resources has become much simpler thanks to the very well reviewed Techypassion. 
UK , 25 September 2015 -- 
Techypassion Announces Site Makeover Offering a Broader Appeal to Visitors 
Finding a free website packed with cutting edge technology advice, tips and resources has become much simpler thanks to the very well reviewed Techypassion. The information-packed blog recently announced they have undergone a complete makeover offering a better looking and easier to navigate visitor experience than ever. There’s few areas that hold as much interest for readers as the ever changing world of technology. Catering to this space in all of its diverse manifestations is the increasingly popular tech blog Techypassion. Focused on advice, tips and the latest news, the increasingly popular bog recently announced they have undergone a complete upgrade, now looking much more visually appealing, and functioning quicker and smoother. Visitors have responded with enthusiasm. “We are very pleased to see so many people benefiting from the articles we are posting, and the feedback that the information we are sharing is helping so many people,” commented Bernie Fitzpatrick, owner of Techypassion. “We’re hoping everyone like the site makeover and look forward to the months and years of Techypassion to come.” According to Techypassion, the main subjects covered on the site include Windows, SEO Tips and Tricks, Word Press, Android, iPhone, assorted gadgets, other technology and much more. The writers are all deeply experienced in the tech world and the emphasis is on providing valuable, usable information. Some recent articles have featured, “Free Streaming Sites to Watch Movies Online”, “Top Reasons to Avoid Free Hosting” and “Three Easy Methods to Unlock a Memory Card Password.” Feedback concerning Techpassion continues to be wildly positive across the board. J.C., from California, recently said, “I just wanted to write to you guys to say thank you for all the great articles you are posting, I can always count on you to give me great quality advice about so many of the things I am interested in and I come to the site regularly to see what’s new. I especially like that you post your new articles to Facebook, it really helps me to see what’s new as it comes out.” For more information be sure to visit http://www.techypassion.com # # #
